adjectives.description: subhuman (comparative more subhuman, superlative most subhuman)

entries.meaning: Less than human; lacking characteristics of a human.
examples: To say he is subhuman is to make a grave insult; whether to him or to humanity is the question.
We say dolphin intelligence is subhuman; I suspect dolphins say our intelligence is subdolphin.

entries.meaning: Anything which is less than human.
